title: Stickman Guys Defense
description: Stickman Guys Defense is an action-packed tower defense game where you must protect your base from endless waves of enemies! Command a team of brave stickman warriors, place them strategically, and upgrade their abilities to stop the invasion. From archers to sword fighters, build the ultimate defense and survive each level! Can you defend your land and become the ultimate Stickman commander?
instructions: Mouse Click

title: Limited Defense
description: Limited Defense is a strategic tower defense game where you command bandits, archers, and explosive towers to hold back relentless waves of enemies. Face off against mischievous Green Slimes, fearsome Orcs, and towering bosses like the Boss King Slime. Upgrade your defenses, unlock legendary warriors, and test your tactical skills in intense, fast-paced battles! Can you make it in this tower defense game?
instructions: Use the left mouse button to drag and drop the allies. Click them to upgrade and sell.

title: Tile Hex World: Red vs Blue
description: Build and destroy! Take part in an exciting battle between Blue and Red! This time, you will have to extract resources, construct buildings and even build entire islands! To fight the enemy, you will need to build a path to his island. Chop down trees, process resources into building hexes, with which you can expand your territory! The winner is the one who captures the enemy flag and subjugates the enemy army!
instructions: PC - to move, use the WASD keys, arrows on the keyboard, or press the left mouse button and drag in the desired direction, cutting trees and shooting at the enemy occurs automatically. Mobile - to move, press your finger on the screen and drag your finger in the desired direction, cutting trees and shooting at the enemy occurs automatically.

title: Future War: Bot Battle in Space 3D
description: Future War: Bot Battle in Space 3D is a real-time strategy game that rewards creativity, depth of strategy, and adaptability. Victory depends on your ability to design and deploy customizable and programmable units to dominate the battlefield.
instructions: 1. Customize your units. 2. Select suitable modules and weapons. 3. Go into battle and get upgrade points. 3. Third improvement points for researching new modules and weapons.

title: Tower Defenders
description: Fight the undead viking warriors and upgrade your defenses. Use the rewards you get for victories to your advantage. Hold out for as long as you can!
instructions: Upgrade your defense towers and gain coins and gems for defeating enemies. Pick out of three cards every two levels and choose which power-ups will help you best. Last as long as you can in an infinite gameplay.

title: The Counterfeit Bank
description: The Counterfeit Bank: Fake Money Tycoon Simulator Think Plague Inc, but with counterfeit cash! Your goal: dominate the economy one fake note at a time. Taxes are soaring, inflation’s out of control, and recession looms—perfect chaos for your evil plan. Print counterfeit money, outsmart enforcers, and flood the market with fake cash to disrupt the system. Can you survive the chaos and take over the economy before time runs out? Mwahahaha!
instructions: Use front companies to hide your counterfeiting activities. Some are more profitable, others harder to detect. Choose your districts wisely. Some offer big rewards but are heavily enforced. Others provide easier inroads but lower returns. They say, "He who controls the money supply, controls the nation." The stakes are high. The clock is ticking. Tick tock.

title: Musketeers Gunpowder vs Steel
description: Take command in Musketeers: Gunpowder vs Steel, a strategic 17th-century battle experience. Lead musketeers, pikemen, and reiters as a mercenary commander, issuing orders, engaging in combat, and training troops. Master tactics, crush your enemies, and claim victory on the battlefield.
instructions: Left Mouse Button or Joystick: Control the commander’s movement Q: Turn Squad Left W: Move Squad Forward E: Turn Squad Right A: Squad Follows the Player S: Stop Squad Movement D: Indicate Target for Squad X: Move Squad Backwards F: Fire Pistol V: Mount Horse Space: Switch Camera View

title: Grukkle Onslaught
description: Grukkle Onslaught: Defend the blue portal in this thrilling tower defense game! Strategically place towers to fend off waves of enemies and protect your gateway. Master strategy and quick thinking to emerge victorious. Play now and prove your skills!
instructions: The navigation in this game is very simple. Use mouse on PC. Use your fingers on mobile.

title: Horror Minecraft Partytime
description: Horror Minecraft Partytime is a spooky and interesting horror survival game. This time you will enter a familiar world of blocks. In this hide-and-seek mode, you will be the pursuer, looking for every corner. Find the weirdo in disguise and catch him.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Uno Online
description: UNO Online is a strategy card game. In the game, the first player to clear his hand will become the winner. In order to win, you need to guess the deck of cards in your opponent's hands and arrange your card order reasonably. There are also function cards in the game. When you draw a function card, think about how to turn the situation to your advantage. You can use color cards to change the color of the game, or use +2 cards to make your opponent's cards never run out.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: TimeWarriors
description: Lead your army to glory through the ages! Embark on an epic journey through history. From primitive battles of the Stone Age to the futuristic wars of the future — become the greatest commander the world has ever known. Become a great commander and lead your army to victory! Play “Time Warriors” now!
instructions: Objective: Lead your army through eras, defeat opponents, and develop your base. Start with basic units and advance to stronger troops. Destroy the enemy’s base to win; lose if your base falls or troops are wiped out. Controls: Units deploy automatically when you have enough “meat” and tap the desired unit. Coins upgrade the base and stats, while “meat” creates units. Use the upgrades tab before battles to boost base health and “meat” recovery, strengthening your army for victory.

title: Gold Miner Tower Defense
description: Gold Miner Tower Defense is a wonderful combination of tower defense, card strategy and upgrade combat. You will play as a brave miner protecting gold from enemies. Protect your precious treasures strategically with many unique defense towers!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Tank Stars Battle Arena
description: Tank Stars - Battle Arena is a tank design strategy game with 2D models. In 14 levels, we need you to build tanks to defeat all enemy tanks. As long as you defeat the enemy pilot, you can win the battle. When you earn enough diamonds, you can open the chests for tank parts in the Shop. You can save at most 3 projects of the tank design. Don't forget to change the positions of different parts, they have different functions.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Zombie Defense: War
description: Progress through the different environments and defend the last sanctuaries of humanity! Merge your towers and use boosters to bolster your chance of success.
instructions: Buy squares and place towers on them. Use boosters to enhance your towers. Defeat the hordes and last as long as you can in the progressively harder levels.

title: Plant Girl Defense Zombie
description: Plant Girl Defense Zombie is a tower-defense shooting strategy game. With 2D cartoon plant girls and zombies, you need to defeat all of the zombies in 24 levels. Change the launching track and select skills when you level up. Different from the traditional Plants VS Zombies series, you don't need to build many plants to fight against zombies. You only need to control one plant to shoot. Good luck!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Board Kings Board Dice
description: Board Kings: Board Dice is a classic multiplayer strategy board game. Do you like to play Monopoly,Board Kings: Board Dice is similar to Monopoly. Become the real Board King by building and upgrading your empire with dice points, building and upgrading your board, or infiltrating other players' boards and attacking their buildings. This is a game where luck and strength go hand in hand to win,how is your luck today? Join us for more surprises waiting to be unlocked!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Plants Vs Zombies War
description: Plants Vs Zombies War is based on the famous PC game called Plants VS Zombies. This tower-defense strategy game needs your plans to fight against 15 kinds of incoming zombies. You can check the consumption and attack of all of your 15 plants before the battle. Then the tutorial will show the basic rules and plants at Level 1. The more levels you complete, the more plants you can unlock. You could also unlock them from ads in advance.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: My Little Farm
description: Welcome to My Little Farm! Roll up your sleeves and dive into the world of planting, harvesting, and selling to meet daily demands. Upgrade your tools, nurture your crops, and keep the farm flourishing. Can you handle the never-ending requests and become the ultimate farmer?
instructions: Select a target to move your farmer over and interact with it. Selecting multiple will allow you to queue up each action for your farmer. Meet increasing and varied quotas in every level to earn money and upgrade your farm to increase your efficiency.

title: Count Escape Rush
description: Count Escape Rush plays like a 3D stickman running arcade game. Different from traditional running arcade games, your members will run backward and shoot the chasing enemies. With 3D stickman soldiers, you need to collect more members and weapons to fight incoming red enemies before you arrive at the finish line. Any obstacles will decrease your members or make you lose directly. Don't forget to pass the green numbered walls and collect weapons to increase your firepower.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Mech Monster Arena
description: Mech Monster Arena is a robot-fighting turn-based strategy game. Differently in this fighting game, you don't need to learn how to operate the robot and release each skill. You only need to learn the basic skill counter rules and select the skills flexibly. By earning EXPs and coins from battles in Mech Battle, you can fight with AI opponents and develop your robot. When you have some sources to upgrade your robot in the Mech Warehouse, you can challenge other players in the Arena. Have fun!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Cannons Blast 3D
description: Cannons Blast 3D plays like another tower defense puzzle game. With a heavy machine gun and a cannon, you need to eliminate all incoming enemy units before they get close to your castle. Your weapon has limited ammo and reloading speed. It is necessary to make a choice of fire coverage. When you earn enough gems, you can buy the other 2 weapons and upgrade your current ones. It is time to test your shooting skills!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Politon
description: Politon is a turn-based strategy game with easy-to-understand mechanics and satisfying visuals. If you want to test your strategical logic against enemies of different numbers and difficulty levels, Politon offers a variety of hex-based maps with various terrains. You'll need to manage your economy while expanding your territories and defend your region against rival invasions.
instructions: Point and click on tiles to select the region you want to manage. Then click on building cards to select which units you want to recruit. Expand your regions by moving units around and defeat your enemies.

title: Collect Honey Puzzle
description: Collect Honey Puzzle is a popular and favorite merge game. You are now in charge of collecting honey, but you need to slowly upgrade to collect it. You can start by collecting sticks and upgrading to bricks. Upgrade from one brick to three and then to the honey jar and finally collect the honey successfully. You can also challenge your highest record anytime, and anywhere. If you are interested in this game, join us!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Drawer Sort
description: Do you like a cluttered space exactly where everything has its place? It is time to organize your life and become a tidying hero, conquering chaos one drawer at a time. Be sure to plan ahead for this epic puzzle or you may find yourself with a messier hand than when you started! Each brain training task will challenge you to place various items in the right places. You'll have to aim for perfect precision if you want to make sure the objects fit snugly and achieve the ultimate tidy victory.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Toy Assembly 3D
description: Assemble a wide variety of brick buildings and scenes in this classic constructor game. Start as a baby builder and level your way up to increasingly complex construction sets. This relaxing and satisfying game is sure to bring you back to the imagination and fun of your childhood! Find the right piece and simply tap to add it to your build. Get hands-on fun without the clutter or accidentally stepping on toys.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Finger Heart Monster Refill
description: Do you love Finger Heart posing? Do you want to make Finger Heart with a cute character? Let's Play This Game. In Finger Heart: Monster Refill, you must choose how to fit your finger with other adorable monsters to form a perfect heart. To fill a perfect heart, you don’t need any special skills, just use your imagination and creativity. They can change its shape in many ways. You'll need to think carefully about which form fits the shape of your fingers. Come make hearts with cute monsters!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Just Dice - Random Tower Defence
description: ? Welcome to "Just Dice: Random Tower Defense"! Get ready to roll the dice and defend your territory against hordes of relentless monsters in this exciting tower defense game. With a unique merging mechanic and vibrant visuals, you'll be hooked from the very first roll!
instructions: ? In "Just Dice: Random Tower Defense," you'll strategically place dice-shaped towers on the map to fend off waves of monsters. Each tower resembles a dice, with different numbers of dots indicating its power level. ? To strengthen your defenses, merge two dice towers of identical dot counts to create a higher-level tower with increased firepower. Choose your merges wisely to build the most powerful defense against the relentless monster onslaught.

title: Crowd Clash Rush
description: In this action-packed game, players will step into the shoes of a fearless warrior, ready to take on hordes of enemies. The game takes place in a vibrant and immersive 3D world, offering stunning visuals and realistic sound effects that will captivate players from the beginning.
instructions: Slide to move

title: Ultimate Plants TD
description: Ultimate Plants TD is an army of plants to protect your garden from countless zombies. Your goal is to protect your garden from challenging waves of zombies. Experimenting with different plant combinations and positioning is the key to maximizing your defense capabilities and overcoming tough challenges!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Ghost Escape 3D
description: You are locked in a hospital that seems to be HAUNTED. Now you have to try to get out of the hospital, but you can only get out after you collect all the posters/pictures, but be careful and quiet, GHOST hears everything.
instructions: WASD - MOVE E - Interact/Pickup in-game elements Mouse - Look Around L - Lock/Unlock Cursor H - Hint X - Map

title: Portal TD - Tower Defense
description: A portal opened, from which crowds of unknown creatures began to climb out! The player's task is to restrain the onslaught of the attackers with all his might, using towers defense.
instructions: mouse or touchscreen

title: Feudal Wars
description: Feudal Wars is a multiplayer browser-based realtime strategy game heavily inspired be Age of Empires. Choose from 12 different civilizations. Collect resources like gold and wood to build your base, and advance through 3 unique ages. Train military units including cavalry, archers and swordsman. Destroy all enemy buildings to win!
instructions: Mouse Controls: Left-click: Select unit/building. Double left-click: Select all similar units on screen. Right-click: Issue command (move, attack, gather, etc.). Click and drag (left button): Draw selection box to select multiple units. Mouse scroll: Move the camera up, down, left, or right (when the mouse is at the edge of the screen). Mouse scroll wheel: Zoom in/out.

title: Hunted Wolf Defense Game
description: Experience thrilling gameplay with the Hunted Wolf Defense Game. As night creeps in, brace yourself for the arrival of the great grey wolf. Strengthen your defenses by upgrading your empty houses and boosting coin production. Take on the hunters with powerful bombs and keep the fight going. Can you withstand the wolf's onslaught?
instructions: Slide to move

title: Kingdoms Wars
description: Throw the dice and step into the Kingdoms Wars game! Monopoly alike, the objective of this board game is to travel around the globe, buying streets and building hotels onto them. Going to jail, pulling bonus cards, paying fees to the king, and paying overpriced when you stay at your competitor houses, are parts of the game. Collect rents, upgrade your hotels, and have fun traveling around!
instructions: PC controls: Mouse. Touch Control works on all browsers and all mobile devices!

title: What The Hen!
description: Funniest collectible heroes battle in almost strategic tower defense duels. Collect over 100 unique Heroes and Heroines cards, ready for combat! Upgrade and evolve every minion into IMBA heroes! Defeat Bosses and complete the campaign adventure! Battle 1on1 against gazillions of summoners in strategic duels in PVP arena! Enjoy event battles for ranks and get special rewards!
instructions: Collect heroes and use them in the batlle.

title: Paradise Island 2
description: Welcome to Paradise Island 2 – the legendary hotel tycoon game! The tropical island looks as beautiful as ever, ready to house your ultimate hotel empire and receive crowds of family tourists, adventure seekers, and even virtual villagers. Develop the lost island into the most luxurious family resort in Paradise Island 2 — one of the sunniest and cutest hotel games out there.
instructions: Use your mouse and click around to interact with the game.

title: WarZone Clash
description: Warzone crash is a multiplayer FPS game, in this game there is a ongoing clash between the ladies and they wants to kill each other, the one who will kill the most will win the match in this multiplayer warzone clash game.
instructions: - Use AWSD to move - Left mouse button to shoot - Scroll to change the weapons

title: ChooChoo Charles Friends Defense
description: ChooChoo Charles Friends Defense is an exhilarating online game that combines survival, action, shooting, and monster elements, offering players an adrenaline experience. This free game is available on kiz10.com, catering to those who seek exciting casual games to enjoy in their free time. Immerse yourself in the world of ChooChoo Charles, where monsters and an evil endemoniado ChooChoo Charles are on the loose, and it's up to you to take them down!
instructions: Computer controls: Use the mouse to point and shoot Touch controls: Tap and swipe to aim and shoot

title: Join Skibidi Clash 3D
description: Join Skibidi Clash 3D is a popular parkour game. This energetic game offers a unique immersive experience, combining the thrill of camera shooting with epic battles. What are you waiting for? Get ready to confront and defeat the toilet monsters!
instructions: Slide to move

title: Clash Of Hive
description: Clash Of Hive is a cartoon occupation game, choose the right time to fight with the right opponent, and win after occupying all the hives.
instructions: The rules are very simple, each occupied hive will automatically generate new bees, click on your own hive and select the hive you want to occupy to let the bees rush out, sacrifice a certain number of bees to occupy the opponent's hive.

title: Tower Defense Clash
description: A horde of horrible monsters is attacking your kingdom, build your towers fast and surviving all the waves. If arrows or stones are not enough, use elements to your advantage and slay them all.
instructions: Build towers on the free spots and they will automatically attack monsters that come near them. Use different combinations of towers and elements to your advantage. If you still feel pressured, use spells and upgrade your towers to the maximum.

title: Clash Of Warriors
description: Become a master of strategy and deck building. Collect and choose from 90 unique magic cards and place them right. Win battles, knock your enemy down, and unlock all 10 Arenas. Dive into a land of endless possibilities, rewards, cards, and levels. Will you be the ultimate victor?
instructions: Build a deck of 12 cards to play against opponents in the arena. Collect winning stars, gold coins, and new cards, merge them into stronger ones, and upgrade your deck. Decks with cards only of the same fraction get a bonus effect. You can also sell unwanted spare cards for coins.

title: Archer Defense
description: Do not let your enemies get past your defense! At first, you will be armed with just a bow that you can upgrade over time. Set-up your defenses with different upgrades like sentries and barbed wires. Make your arrows stronger with different power-ups such as bomb, multi-shot and freeze arrows, and use them to your tactical advantage. Come back daily to collect daily rewards. Uncover lootboxes to obtain cards that will unlock new and powerful bows. How long can your defenses hold out against a massive wave of enemies?
instructions: Defend your position with a trusty bow

title: Clash Of Dots
description: Here is a strategy matching game that is made from 2D simple game art styles. Your target is to attack and match all red areas. All areas have their own charging Cool Down. You need to pick the right timing to attack red areas or defend your green areas. Don't forget to use the two useful special skills below when you get yourself into trouble.
instructions: Drag to play

title: Castle of Magic
description: Wield powerful magic and defeat furious monsters in this magical game. You will master a large number of spells (some of which will allow you to be transformed into different animals). Play levels that have interactive surfaces, where you can fly, slide, float, walk on the ceiling, and more! Get through 5 magic countries and save the world from villains.
instructions: Control with Virtual buttons

title: Slime Farm
description: We present you the game: Farm, about small and cute slimes! These adorable animals will fill your ranch and become great friends for you. The right strategy will allow you to quickly open every one of the cutest slimes. Gradually unlock new levels with new heroes. In this game, in addition to level improvements, you can increase the production level and get even more in-game currency.
instructions: The goal of the game is to open all the slime babies. Control - tap on the field with slices to speed up production, swipe on trucks to speed up sales.

title: 2048 Defense
description: Defend your castle against coming waves of enemies in lots of different and unique levels! Choose one of the many tower options there are, choose red exploding projectiles or blue freezing ones or unlock even more unique towers with unique shooting abilities to defend the castle against more and more enemy waves!
instructions: Click on buttons to buy new towers or upgrade them. Click and drag towers over each other to merge them together.

title: Super Defense Tank
description: Super Defense Tank is a challenging game with all the arcade essence of the 90's! Equip new cannons, collect different Power-Ups, defeat the 4 Robot Kings and earn new scores! But most importantly... Shoot, shoot and don't stop shooting!
instructions: Controls WASD or arrow keys = move J or Z = shoot K or X = switch Esc or enter = pause

title: Clash of Heroes
description: Create your team and attack other kingdoms, defeat the opposing troops, destroy their castles and lead your team to victory. Each victory will earn you medals, experience and gold with which you can upgrade your troops and your castle so you can face stronger and stronger enemies. Travel through different territories and conquer them all!
instructions: Create a deck with at least 3 heroes and than choose a level to play. During the war choose a card from your deck click on it and drag it to battlefield, if you have enough points to summon the hero, he will spawn.

title: Gold Tower Defense
description: “Gold Tower Defense – Protect Gold” is a tower defense game that protects gold from monster attacks by installing a tower in a fixed location. It consists of a total of 80 story modes. When you win a stage, collect the stars you receive to get rewards. Try to level up by picking a tower of the desired grade in the Tower Draw. As you level up, you can make more powerful attacks. Heroes and items can be used anywhere you want to help you win.
instructions: [PC browser] left,right,up,down key + enter key Supported mouse [Mobile] Touch
